occupation: Senior Partner Success Associate at Stay22
headline: Senior Partner Success Associate at Stay22
summary:
Seller in B to B and B to C
Consulting  to help company to organized their time, productivity and employee 
Management in hospitality sector
Co director in grocery sector
Organisation for small company

experiences.title: Area Manager/ co director
experiences.description:
- Managed the store representing $60M in annual reveue
- Interfaces with director of property management on a regular basis regarding property performance with respect to evictions, expense controls, staffing general operational
- Gathered all banking transactions via statements, recorded activity in excel format and reconciled balances. Prepared payroll reports 
- Documented reports of daily activities and irregularities such as property damage, theft, guest or employee accidents and unusual occurrences, in compliance with regulations. 
- Ability to self manage, handle multiple tasks, and prioritize duties and responsibilities.
- Managed team of 170 employees at peak demand, overseeing the hiring, training, and professional growth of employees
- Manage food safety audits
- Lead and manage multiple teams. Implement performance and talent management strategies to ensure teams deliver and execute on all objectives
- Participates in the development and marketing of proprietary database
- Maintained price accuracy of goods and ensured adequate stock levels
- Works with co-workers as a team to ensure customer satisfaction and a pleasant work environment
- Provides feedback and recommendations to Store Director, District Manager or VP of Operations, and Division Management teams on operational issues

experiences.title: Gérant de restaurant
experiences.description:
- Led and directed team members (team of 15) 
- Ultimately responsible for the dining room’s appearance, consistency of set up, food and beverage service and quality of the experience
- Enforces and adheres to all unit and company alcohol service policies and procedures
- Conducted health and safety process evaluations to identify and remedy 
any violations immediately
- HR / Onboarding tasks: Recruitments, training and managed team. conducted and executed the company’s business strategies, follow the KPI and increase the target by 15%
- Created fun team building activities to engage staff in up-selling to meet revenue targets.

experiences.title: Team Supervisor
experiences.description:
- Led and directed team members (team of 15) 
- Ultimately responsible for the dining room’s appearance, consistency of set up, food and beverage service and quality of the experience
- Enforces and adheres to all unit and company alcohol service policies and procedures
- Conducted health and safety process evaluations to identify and remedy 
any violations immediately

experiences.title: Hospitality in Australia
experiences.description:
- Maintain high level food quality
- Manage portion controls and food waste
- Follow and execute recipes and standards
- Follow and implement all rules and guidelines implemented by the Department of Health
- Follow requisition of food items policy
- BEO's costed on daily basis
- Recipe cards developed, followed and used in conjunction with use records
- Follow-up on production charts to ensure no over producing and waste

experiences.title: Insurance Consultant
experiences.description:
- Continuously learn about the insurance products offered and law insurance 
- Be able to demonstrate their value to the customers and prospects
- Problem solving, analytical thinking
- Make effective formal presentations
- Accountable for the delivery of value to customers and stakeholders by ensuring that the right product is defined, prioritized, and built
- Solid experience in Insurance, Reinsurance industry or consulting
- Proactive and self-monitoring
- Identify opportunities and to turn these into concept/s and reality
- Organized, disciplined, self-motivated and efficient

experiences.title: Seller B to B
experiences.description:
- Responsibility for achieving sales targets in assigned territory
- Acquire new customers and build sustainable customer relationships
- Track generated deals
- Retain existing customers and expand the customer base
- Increase sales of automobile spare part
- Ensure customer satisfaction and loyalty
- Multi-tasking , prioritization of workload and strong attention to detail 
- Strong experience in selling into new accounts
- Follow up with customers to gather feedback and answer questions regarding their experience with our products
- Help develop business plans outlining tactics, activities and resources to increase market acceptance and utilization
- Overcome technical and business objections of existing and prospective customers
- Home office conditions when not actively traveling in territory
